## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass (`php tests/run-tests.php`)
- [ ] Code follows PSR-12 coding standards
- [ ] All PHP files have `declare(strict_types=1)`
- [ ] No new external Composer dependencies added
- [ ] CSS classes use `rip-*` prefix (if applicable)
